subject: California Chrome (Race Horse)
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Belmont Stakes
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Steve Coburn spoke out in favor of limiting the race to horses that had run the first two legs of the Triple Crown, but that would change the dynamics of the entire series, making it much easier to complete the trifecta.
snippet: Steve Coburn spoke out in favor of limiting the race to horses that had run the first two legs of the Triple Crown, but that would change the dynamics of the entire series, making it much easier to complete the trifecta.
